data.title: Jelle Zijlstra on LinkedIn: Destruction of world’s pristine rainforests soared in 2022 despite Cop26…
data.meta_description: ‘We will halt deforestation’ they said…. Our leaders are actively murdering us, aided by greedy corporations. Join a climate action group now.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.
